abstract: New York Knicks president Phil Jackson picks 19-year-old 7-foot-1 Latvian forward Kristaps Porzingis in first round of NBA draft; is booed by fans for choice, but seems not to care as he has always maintained that he will not be swayed by public opinion in rebuilding team.
lead_paragraph: Porzingis, a 7-foot-1 forward from Latvia who has spent the past three seasons with Cajasol Sevilla of the Spanish league, is regarded as a player with huge potential but may need time to develop.

headline.main: 2015 N.B.A. Draft: Kristaps Porzingis Is a Big Project for the Rebuilding Knicks
headline.print_headline: To Rebuild, Knicks Start With Big Project

snippet: Porzingis, a 7-foot-1 forward from Latvia who has spent the past three seasons with Cajasol Sevilla of the Spanish league, is regarded as a player with huge potential but may need time to develop.
